item.dc:creator: TheHippo
item.description:
mankyman6:

The guns in source feel “hollow”, for the lack of a better word, to me. It takes all the fun out of killing someone.

A lot of that had to do with the sounds. They were kinda weak.

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
Nerdguy:

Fix’d

I believe you mean, brok’d

The guns in source feel “hollow”, for the lack of a better word, to me. It takes all the fun out of killing someone.

No, I’m not saying COD is better. In COD, it feels like I’m shooting a card board cut out instead of an actual person.

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: DenDrio
item.description:
xtobix:

your noob. if you loved cs and knew the social/competitive aspect of the game, you would understand them… but you don’t so just ignore and stop flaming them. cs is the most competitive game ever made and it should stay like that. why? because there are many more competitive players than pub players. there are enaugh entertaining pub games. competitive games need skill and brain. i don’t want a dumbed down cs. seriously people like you make me crazy. there are too many entertaining noob-games out there already… so if you like games that way go play them. omfg

You just trollin’ right?

Read full topic

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: fury
item.description:
Maxey:

https://eseanews.com/index.php?s=news&d=comments&id=9969

Read the comments.

Those idiots are so fucking self-centered they completely ignore the fact that non-competitive players also like to play CS for fun.

Basically they want Valve to get on their knees and suck their dicks off while attending to their every need.

If they’re so fucking smart and think they know better, why don’t they just make their own perfect CS clone and play that instead?

It’s incredible that these pricks have actually managed to keep CS from evolving beyond its core format because of their bloated sense of self-importance.

your noob. if you loved cs and knew the social/competitive aspect of the game, you would understand them… but you don’t so just ignore and stop flaming them. cs is the most competitive game ever made and it should stay like that. why? because there are many more competitive players than pub players. there are enaugh entertaining pub games. competitive games need skill and brain. i don’t want a dumbed down cs. seriously people like you make me crazy. there are too many entertaining noob-games out there already… so if you like games that way go play them. omfg

Read full topic

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
New Interview with Gabe Newell

  • CSGO is not CS2

  • There are people at Valve who would like to develop Ricochet 2

  • They don’t get tired by the Half Life 3 questions, they just don’t have anything to tell

  • There won’t be game-trading in steam that fast

And there are some other interesting statements.

Read full topic

item.description:
calhoun freeman:

Iron sights. COMPLETELY COD.
[COLOR=‘Red’]Not Really, it’s just how it is IRL

no.

CS will NEVER have iron sights,
[COLOR=‘red’]CS have iron sights, you just can’t “use” it

nor have attachments except for the silencer of the M4.
[COLOR=‘red’]How about scopes on sg552/aug/snipers?

And yeah, we don’t exactly see through the scope of sg552/aug in CS, we just zoom our view.

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
shifty:

I dont mean to be critical or sound like some whiny rat but, from watching the trailer it looks like what CoD :MW2 was for CoD :MW.

Seriously, just redone maps,models and same gameplay?? I thought they were going to change the gameplay completely and mimicking the CoD style e.g. iron sights, weapon updates etc etc

Iron sights. COMPLETELY COD.

no.

CS will NEVER have iron sights, nor have attachments except for the silencer of the M4.

Read full topic
item.source: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
In all honesty I’m pretty sure VALVe is going to tweak some weapon perks here and there, maybe switch up the gameplay so that Consoles have a chance.
But they’ll most likely going to keep true to just regular old-Counter-Strike.

The re-done maps also look exceptional.

Good job VALVe. And good luck.

Read full topic

item.source: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
You know, ironically enough, about a month or two ago I was debating with a friend of mine about whether or not I should get MW3 or BF3. Somehow we got onto the topic of how successful VALVe would be if they ported Counter-Strike to the consoles.

Well sure enough, a month or so later, here I am.

I’m genuinely interested to see how well this is going to play out.

Read full topic

item.title: Shit just got real - Counter Strike 2
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Reboot was the shit. I still hum the firewall to myself any time I see the word.

And the game obviously looks a lot better than CSS. Huge improvements. It doesn’t look as good as a lot of modern games, but it’s not a full-sized release. It’s an XBLA/PSN/Steam-only game.

Read full topic
